description: This is the letter David McCraw, vice president and assistant general counsel of The New York Times, wrote in response to a request from Marc E. Kasowitz, Mr. Trump's lawyer, to retract an article that featured two women accusing Mr. Trump of touching them inappropriately years ago, and issue an apology.
title: The New York Times’s Lawyer Responds to Donald Trump
title_page: The New York Times’s Lawyer Responds to Donald Trump - The New York Times
